channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MD

item.title: Report X-2023081147
item.description:
Report X-2023081147

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-14T03:11:45+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-11
  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS PICKED UP ON UNLOAD WET AND DAMAGED DescribePack: UPON INSPECTION FOUND 2 OUT OF 4 BOTTLES TO HAVE A BROKEN SEAL WHICH ALLOWED THE PRODUCT TO LEAK OUT. PACKAGE IS UNVERIFIED DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: RED TOTE
